00019 #ifndef FIXPOINT_H
00020 #define FIXPOINT_H
00021 
00022 #include "graph.h"
00023 #include "beta.h"
00024 #include "numberer.h"
00025 #include "numbererHashTable.h"
00026 #include "numbererSequentiel.h"
00027 #include "label.h"
00028 
00029 #define forEachVertex(v) for(v = 0 ; v < size ; v++)
00030 
00031 // compute the fixPoint for two graphs
00032 class fixPointTwoGraphs {
00033         public :
00034         // constructor
00035         fixPointTwoGraphs(Graph *tg1, Graph *tg2, int tdMax,bool hashing=true) {
00036                 g1=tg1; g2=tg2; dMax=tdMax;
00037                 size=g1->getOrder();
00038                 
00039                 // some simple controls
00040                 if(size != g2->getOrder()) {
00041                         cerr << "Graphs must have the same number of vertices" << endl;
00042                         exit(-1);
00043                 }
00044                 if(g1->getNbEdges() != g2->getNbEdges()) {
00045                         cerr << "Graphs must have the same number of edges" << g1->getNbEdges()  << " " << g2->getNbEdges() << endl;
00046                         exit(-1);
00047                 }
00048                 
00049                 // memory allocation
00050                 if(hashing == true) {
00051                         nu = new numbererHashTable(2*size,size*3);
00052                 } else {
00053                         nu = new numbererSequentiel(2*size,size*3);
00054                 }
00055                 
00056                 b1 = new Beta(g1,dMax);
00057                 b2 = new Beta(g2,dMax);
00058                 tempLabel = new short[g1->getOrder()];
00059                 temp = new short[size*3];
00060         };
00061 
00062         // destructor
00063         ~fixPointTwoGraphs(void) {
00064                 delete [] tempLabel;
00065                 delete [] temp;
00066                 delete b1;
00067                 delete b2;
00068                 delete nu;
00069         };
00070 
00071         void init(void) {
00072                 b1->init();
00073                 b2->init();
00074         }
00075         
00076         // compute the fix point for the two graphs
00077         // return the number of different labels or -1 if incomparable
00078         int computeFixPoint(Label *tl1, Label *tl2) {
00079                 int nbL, newNbL;
00080                 bool toContinue;
00081                 l1=tl1; l2=tl2;
00082                 
00083                 nbL = l1->getNbLabels();
00084                 int nbIter = 0;
00085                 toContinue = true;
00086                 // repeat until the number of labels can increase
00087                 while(toContinue) {
00088                         nbIter++;
00089                         toContinue = false;
00090                         // compute one step of alpha
00091                         newNbL = onePass();
00092                         // if graphs are incompatible
00093                         if(newNbL == -1) {
00094                                 return -1;
00095                         } else {
00096                                 // if there is more vertex labels than previously
00097                                 // one can make another step except when the number of labels
00098                                 // is equal to the order of the graph
00099                                 if((newNbL > nbL)&&(newNbL != size)) {
00100                                         toContinue = true;
00101                                 }
00102                                 nbL = newNbL;
00103                         }
00104                 }
00105                 return nbL;
00106         };
00107 
00108 
00109 
00110         protected :
00111 
00112         // replace vertex label l by Psi(l) for both the graphs and check 
00113         // compatibility
00114         short onePass(void) {
00115                 int v, sOfTemp;
00116 
00117                 nu->clear();
00118                 //G1
00119                 b1->initCompute();
00120                 forEachVertex(v) {
00121                         // compute the label of v
00122                         sOfTemp = b1->compute(v,temp,l1);
00123                         // return the number for this label
00124                         tempLabel[v] = nu->insert(sOfTemp,temp);
00125                 }
00126                 l1->restore(tempLabel);
00127 
00128                 //G2
00129                 b2->initCompute();
00130                 forEachVertex(v) {
00131                         // compute the label of v
00132                         sOfTemp = b2->compute(v,temp,l2);
00133                         // return the number for this label
00134                         tempLabel[v] = nu->insert(sOfTemp,temp);
00135                 }
00136                 l2->restore(tempLabel);
00137                 
00138                 if(l1->compare(l2)) {
00139                         return -1;
00140                 }
00141                 return l1->getNbLabels();
00142         }
00143         
00144         
00145         short size;
00146         // ref to the two graphs
00147         Graph * g1;
00148         Graph * g2;
00149         
00150         // ref to the two initial labelling functions
00151         Label * l1;
00152         Label * l2;
00153         
00154         // maximal distance
00155         short dMax;
00156         
00157         // a temporary labelling function
00158         short * tempLabel;
00159         
00160         // the label renumberer
00161         numberer * nu;
00162         
00163         // Psi function for graph 1
00164         Beta * b1;
00165         // Psi function for graph 2
00166         Beta * b2;
00167         
00168         // temporary set used to build the new labels
00169         short * temp;
00170 
00171 };
00172 
00173 
00174 #endif
